summary: This document is an email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Jeanne Brennan regarding the delivery of an ACAT (Automated Customer Account Transfer) for Southern Financial. Amanda informs Jeanne that the ACAT was sent via FedEx and delivered, but may not yet be in Janet's possession due to compliance procedures at JPM.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, communicating about the delivery of an ACAT.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is the recipient of the email, inquiring about the status of the ACAT for Southern Financial.

persons.name: Janet
persons.context: Janet is mentioned as a person who may not have received the ACAT yet.

connections.description: Amanda and Jeanne are colleagues communicating about a work-related matter.
Amanda refers to Janet in the context of her receiving the ACAT, indicating a workplace relationship.

events.title: Delivery of ACAT for Southern Financial
events.description: The ACAT for Southern Financial was sent via FedEx and delivered.

keyFacts: The ACAT for Southern Financial was sent via FedEx and delivered on the morning of October 2, 2013.
There may be a delay in delivery to Janet due to compliance procedures at JPM.
Amanda Kirby is associated with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
